description:
Originally a High Angel, he is one of the High ranking angels that the Six Saint Beasts look up to, especially Judas. For some reason he goes against Zeus and tempts Judas to do the same thing and join him, but Judas refuses to do so. He is banished from Heaven and becomes a fallen angel, creating Hell as his domain. The reason for his banishment is unclear.
Attribute: Light
Image Color: Ebony
name: Datenshi Lucifer
